attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it illegal for water utililty companies to be able to force householders to have a water meter installed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a democracy and are supposed to have the right to self determination.  It is a known fact that water utility companies use water meters as a means by which to increase their revenue and avoid their obligation properly to manage the water which comes down from the sky free of charge.  Householders should not be forced by government legislation to have a water meter as a filip for the water companies.
